title: Time is gold
author: Time is gold
content: Crypto Finance operates its own DEFI and NFT platforms to form an ecosystem of Crypto Finance with coins with actual growth value.Crypto Finance will establish a STOP exchange based on the Crypto Finance ecosystem where investors, not Scam projects, can see the value of the project and invest for a long time.1. CTFT used in the Crypto Finance ecosystem incinerates 20% of the fees (the value of CTFT increases as the ecosystem expands).2. Crypto Finance Spot Exchange incinerates 20% of its proceeds after repurchase every quarter. Please check the link for more informationhttps://t.me/CryptoFinance_1Â  http://
